mapper.select: select * from reple where boardno = #{boardno} order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into reple(boardno, id, nickname, reple) values(#{boardno},#{id},#{nickname},#{reple})
mapper.delete: delete from reple where no = #{no} and id = #{id} and boardno = #{boardno}
mapper.update: update reple set reple = #{reple}, reg_dt = now() where boardno = #{boardno} and id = #{id} and no = #{no}
